name: Zombie Killer (Mojtaba M)
description:
if you want to get sick or you're looking for something worse than killing yourself  then congratulations you choosed  the right game. 

this is a survival top down shooter game that you'll be in a random position and you have to kill zombies in the world and looking for some ammo.  and of course it makes me happy to read your opinion about my game.

youtube : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCUmwDPWqrXuwKU9ZkGx3lSA
